chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f g : R_UniformSpace -> R) (x : R_UniformSpace), locally x (fun x0 : R_UniformSpace => f x0 = g x0) -> continuity_pt f x -> continuity_pt g x

Premises:
R_UniformSpace = UniformSpace.Pack R R_UniformSpace_mixin R : UniformSpace
*** [ R : Set ]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
continuity_pt = fun (f : R -> R) (x0 : R) => continue_in f no_cond x0 : (R -> R) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
locally_pt_comp : forall (P : R -> Prop) (f : R -> R) (x : R), locally (f x) P -> continuity_pt f x -> locally x (fun x0 : R_UniformSpace => P (f x0))
continuity_pt_locally_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (a x : R), 0 < a -> (forall y : R, R_dist y x < a -> f y = g y) -> continuity_pt f x -> continuity_pt g x
continuity_pt_locally : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> (forall eps : posreal, locally x (fun u : R_UniformSpace => Rabs (f u - f x) < eps))
continuity_pt_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f x0 -> f x0 <> 0 -> continuity_pt (/ f) x0
Ranalysis5.continuity_pt_recip_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), lb < ub -> (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> comp f g x = id x) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> lb <= g x <= ub) -> (forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> continuity_pt f a) -> forall b : R, f lb < b < f ub -> continuity_pt g b
Ranalysis5.continuity_pt_recip_prelim : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), lb < ub -> (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall x : R, lb <= x <= ub -> comp g f x = id x) -> (forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> continuity_pt f a) -> forall b : R, f lb < b < f ub -> continuity_pt g b
continuity_pt_locally' : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> (forall eps : posreal, locally' x (fun u : R_UniformSpace => Rabs (f u - f x) < eps))
Ranalysis5.leftinv_is_rightinv_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall y : R, f lb <= y -> y <= f ub -> comp f g y = id y) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> lb <= g x <= ub) -> forall x : R, lb <= x <= ub -> comp g f x = id x
limit_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (D : R -> Prop) (l x0 : R), limit1_in f D l x0 -> l <> 0 -> limit1_in (fun x : R => / f x) D (/ l) x0
filterlim_ext_loc : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, ?F (fun x : ?T => f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
continuity_pt_mult : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f1 x0 -> continuity_pt f2 x0 -> continuity_pt (f1 * f2) x0
continuity_pt_div : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f1 x0 -> continuity_pt f2 x0 -> f2 x0 <> 0 -> continuity_pt (f1 / f2) x0
continuity_pt_filterlim' : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> filterlim f (locally' x) (locally (f x))
continuity_pt_filterlim : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x))
continue_in = fun (f : R -> R) (D : R -> Prop) (x0 : R) => limit1_in f (D_x D x0) (f x0) x0 : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope]
filterlim_comp : forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
locally_ex_dec : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x0 : ?T, P x0 \/ ~ P x0) -> locally x P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
C0_extension_lt : forall (f : R -> ?T) (la lb : ?T) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall c : R, a < c < b -> filterlim f (locally c) (locally (f c))) -> filterlim f (at_right a) (locally la) -> filterlim f (at_left b) (locally lb) -> {g : R -> ?T | (forall c : R_UniformSpace, filterlim g (locally c) (locally (g c))) /\ (forall c : R, a < c < b -> g c = f c) /\ g a = la /\ g b = lb} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
Ranalysis5.f_interv_is_interv : forall (f : R -> R) (lb ub y : R), lb < ub -> f lb <= y <= f ub -> (forall x : R, lb <= x <= ub -> continuity_pt f x) -> {x : R | lb <= x <= ub /\ f x = y}
C0_extension_right : forall (f : R -> ?T) (lb : ?T) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall c : R, a < c < b -> filterlim f (locally c) (locally (f c))) -> filterlim f (at_left b) (locally lb) -> {g : R -> ?T | (forall c : R, a < c -> filterlim g (locally c) (locally (g c))) /\ (forall c : R, c < b -> g c = f c) /\ g b = lb} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
C0_extension_left : forall (f : R -> ?T) (la : ?T) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall c : R, a < c < b -> filterlim f (locally c) (locally (f c))) -> filterlim f (at_right a) (locally la) -> {g : R -> ?T | (forall c : R, c < b -> filterlim g (locally c) (locally (g c))) /\ (forall c : R, a < c -> g c = f c) /\ g a = la} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
C0_extension_le : forall (f : R -> ?T) (a b : R), (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> filterlim f (locally c) (locally (f c))) -> {g : R -> ?T | (forall c : R_UniformSpace, filterlim g (locally c) (locally (g c))) /\ (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> g c = f c)} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
f_equal_R : forall (B : Type) (f : R -> B) (x y : R), x = y -> f x = f y
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
inv_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => / f x : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
locally_interval : forall (P : R -> Prop) (x : R) (a b : Rbar), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> (forall y : R, Rbar_lt a y -> Rbar_lt y b -> P y) -> locally x P
